Dear PhocusWright attendee,
It was pleasure speaking with you today. Below you will find your unique promotion code to recieve a $25 MasterCard gift card.
How to recieve your free $25 MasterCard gift card: Just stop by the WEX kiosk at the PhoCusWright conference and speak to one of our Payment Specialists to learn more about how WEX Travel can have a positive impact on your business. Then, provide this email (or show it on your smartphone) and you will recieve a $25 MasterCard. While you are there, you can enter to win an iPad mini. It's that simple.
With WEX Travel you can pay the right amount, at the right time, to the right supplier through your existing systems all while generating additional revenue for your business.
Additional benefits include:
99.9% reconciliation Automate processes Optimize cash flow International and Domestic payments Control Spend
For over a decade, WEX has been leading the way in single-use payment technology to the travel industry. Several of the largest online travel agencies payments are powered by WEX Travel. To learn more, visit our Resource Center: http://www.wexinc.com/virtual-payments/insights/videos/
